short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Be smarter by bringing AI power to your browser. Saves time by instantly summarizing long text & finds information quickly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension transforms your browser experience. 
Get instant summaries of complex and long text in three ways:

Feature 1: Click a flash icon to replace long paragraphs with small and concise summaries.
Feature 2: Right-click on selected text for an instant summary.
Find information quickly: Ask questions directly about the webpage content for super fast insights.

Unlock the power of GPT LLM AI within Chrome. 
Save time, boost comprehension, and become more productive!
